TextView.android:text:
Welcome to Music Suggestion!
After entering Hot or Not, you will be prompted for how many songs you want suggested (up to 20).

For each song, you can either say you like it (Hot) or dislike it (Not) by tapping the appropriate button.

You can also replay the song with the Replay button.

When you have exhausted all songs, or when you hit Done, you will taken to a playlist of your suggested songs.

From here you can cycle through with the Next and Previous buttons, as well as Replay to replay the song.

Hope you enjoy!
